page.title: 20A Day in the Life of...
page.content: AT 8 O'CLOCK IN THE MORNING I GET UP AND GET CHANGED.I GET MY BREAKFAST I SOMETIMES HAVE CEREAL OR TOAST.AFTER MY BREAKFAST I PACK MY BAG AND I GET MY COAT ON.AT HALF PAST EIGHT I GO TO THE SHOP TO GET SOME SWEETS AND GO TO THE BUS STOP AND WAIT.AT TWENTY TO NINE THE BUS COMES IT TAKES ABOUT TEN MINUTES TO GET TO SCHOOL.WE HAVE ABOUT FIVE MINUTES PLAYTIME.WE GET ASSEMBLY AND IT SOMETIMES TAKES THREE QUARTERS OF AN HOUR OR FIFTEEN MINUTES.AT TWENTY TO FOUR THE BELL GOES TO GO HOME.I HAVE MY TEA AT QUARTER PAST FOUR AND SOMETIMES GO OUT AT FIVE O'CLOCK.I CALL FOR JIMMY LISTER AND OTHER PEOPLE AND PLAY FOOTBALL MOSTLY. I USUALLY GO IN AT SEVEN O'CLOCK AND HAVE MY SUPPER AT NINE O'CLOCK. SOMETIMES I GO TO BED AT HALF PAST NINE. DAVID LUKE.
